visualizingPalestine.title: Water Justice for Gaza
visualizingPalestine.excerpt: An illustrated breakdown of the infrastructure attacks that have cut Palestinians in Gaza off from clean water.

visualizingPalestine.title: Preserving Palestinian Cultural Memory
visualizingPalestine.excerpt: A timeline of community archives safeguarding stories of Palestinian resistance and daily life.

bdsCampaigns.title: Scholastic Ends Textbook Contract
bdsCampaigns.excerpt: Following months of organizing, Scholastic has ended a distribution agreement with an Israeli publisher complicit in apartheid.

bdsCampaigns.title: Universities Vote to Divest from Apartheid
bdsCampaigns.excerpt: Student-led referendums secured divestment mandates at three universities, expanding academic commitments to boycott Israeli apartheid.
